pages.text: Inhibition reaction will be triggered when any of the following pairs of elements exist at the same time. The reaction consumes a small amount of the former element and a large amount of the latter. The occurrence of inhibition reaction can have a harmful effect on the entity involved.

Solidification(Earth -> Water): Instant reaction. The target gains a solidification effect and slows down. If the target takes more than 10% of its health during solidification, the solidification will release and the current damage taken by the target will be enhanced. The reaction strength determines the effect time and level.
Vaporization(Water -> Fire): Instant reaction. The negative effects achieved by the target are spread into effect cloud. The reaction intensity determines the existence time of the effect cloud.

Melting(Fire -> Metal): Instant reaction. The target catches fire and produces an explosion of fire elements that ignore the enemy or self. The intensity of the reaction determines the scope and damage of the explosion.

Cutting(Metal -> Wood): Continuous reaction. During the reaction, when the entity is damaged, it will receive an additional metal element damage. The intensity of reaction determines the amount of damage.
Parasitism(Wood -> Earth): Continuous reaction. The entity continues to lose spiritual, and then lose health if no spiritual. The intensity of the reaction determines the amount of loss.
